Class StyleClassedTextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • org.fxmisc.richtext.GenericStyledArea<PS,java.lang.String,S>

              • org.fxmisc.richtext.StyleClassedTextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClipboardActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, EditActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, TwoDimensional, NavigationActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>, StyleActions<PS,java.lang.String>, TextEditingArea<PS,java.lang.String,S>, UndoActions, ViewActions<PS,java.lang.String,S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeArea

    public class StyleClassedTextArea
extends StyledTextArea<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>>
    Text area that uses style classes to define style of text segments and paragraph segments.

      • foldParagraphs

        public void foldParagraphs​(int startPar,
                           int endPar)
        Folds (hides/collapses) paragraphs from startPar to endPar, "into" (i.e. excluding) the first paragraph of the range.

      • foldSelectedParagraphs

        public void foldSelectedParagraphs​()
        Folds (hides/collapses) the currently selected paragraphs, "into" (i.e. excluding) the first paragraph of the range.

      • foldText

        public void foldText​(int start,
                     int end)

        a Predicate that given a paragraph style, returns true if it includes folding.
